meanings.definition: Not relating to or associated with the Christian church.
meanings.sent1: The museum displayed a collection of nonecclesiastical artifacts.
meanings.sent2: The government building had a nonecclesiastical design.
meanings.sent3: The nonecclesiastical squirrel seemed to be enjoying the church garden.
meanings.sent4: Her nonecclesiastical beliefs were like a colorful painting in a gray room.
meanings.sent5: The nonecclesiastical decorations at the party made it stand out.

meanings.definition: Not of or relating to religious matters or institutions.
meanings.sent1: The school's curriculum included nonecclesiastical subjects like math and science.
meanings.sent2: The book club focused on nonecclesiastical themes.
meanings.sent3: The nonecclesiastical cat refused to enter the church.
meanings.sent4: His nonecclesiastical views on life were like a breath of fresh air.
meanings.sent5: The nonecclesiastical approach to problem-solving was innovative.
